channel.title: What are questions to help create a Slogan or Tagline?
channel.description:
I'm working on our slogan / tagline.
I've done a fair amount of research. Lots of good suggestions out there for *goals* (memberable, unique, etc.)
But what would help even more is some good questions.
Here's what I've found so far:
1. What is your company's **mission**? 2. What are the **benefits and features** of your products or services? 3. What do your customers and prospects already **think** of your company? 4. What **qualities** do you want them to associate with your company?
Any other good questions?
Thanks!
-Clay

item.title: What are questions to help create a Slogan or Tagline?
item.dc:creator: steve
item.description:
Clay_Nichols:

What are the benefits and features of your products or services?

Put another way, what pain do your products alleviate? Maybe “Speech & language therapy software that isn’t kid stuff” or the like.

I’ve seen a lot of advice to look at your user feedback for what they say about the products and to try to use their words and phrasing as a guide.
